RelatedSentence: A reindeer herder , Yuri Khudi , and his sons found the remains in 2007 while searching for wood along the frozen Yuribei river on the Yamal peninsula .
She was in perfect condition , and scans have revealed how she met her end .

Her trunk was filled with mud , leading researchers to suspect that she sank quickly into a mudpool that froze and preserved her body .

Work on her stomach contents found a congealed , brownish - white substance that turned out to be her mother 's milk .
